channel.title: BIG big problem pray problem
channel.description: When i use pray and when i have 0 pray i cant get it up not even in pray altar.....

item.title: BIG big problem pray problem
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Must be different then yours

but here

    if(objectID == 10638 || objectID == 409 || objectID == 411 || objectID == 4859){
        if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) {
		if(inCombat) {
		if (choad == 0) {
		sM("You can't regain prayer in combat!");
		choad = 1;
		}
		} else {
            sM("You already have full Prayer points.");
			}
        } else {
		if(inCombat) {
		sM("You can't regain prayer in combat!");
		} else {
	    startAnimation(645);
            playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
            sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
            sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013);
            sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012);
            sM("You recharge your Prayer points.");
        }  
		}
}

u might get errors, if so u have to re-name some stuff.

Read full topic
